chat.speaker: Kaelor of the Obsidian Order
chat.message: Your so-called Dawn Legion is a stain on this realm. Our Order will reshape the world in shadow whether your light survives or not.

chat.speaker: Serin of the Dawn Legion
chat.message: Your shadows are nothing but fear masquerading as strength. The Legion will burn away every twisted doctrine your Order spreads.

chat.speaker: Kaelor
chat.message: You cling to that naive radiance like it protects you. The Obsidian Order’s rise is inevitable. Oppose us and you’ll be swept aside with the rest of the deluded.

chat.speaker: Serin
chat.message: We don’t bow to tyrants hiding behind darkness. If it’s a clash of convictions you want the Legion stands ready. We won’t let your corruption swallow the realm.
